Base:Descriptions.Base:Description: button schematics book for blacksmiths
A thick book of 93 thin vellum pages bound in heavy parchment. Upon the cover is written in neat script "Button Schematics for Blacksmiths."
A thick book bound in heavy parchment. Upon the cover is written in neat script "Button Schematics for Blacksmiths."

the first page of this button schematics book for blacksmiths

Written in the same neat script as the cover of this button schematics book are the words "Table of Contents" at the top of the first page. Divided into two columns below in tiny print you see this list: "acacia, acorn, amaryllis, anchor, ankh, baroque, barrel, beehive, berry, bi-cone, boat, butterfly, candy, cauldron, chrysanthemum, cicada, circular, clam, cloud, cross, crown, dragon, dragonfly, elliptical, faceted, fairy, firefly, flat, fleur-de-lis, frog, gorath, hexagram, horseshoe, lantern, leaf, lily, lotus, moon, mushroom, nugget, octogram, octopus, pegasus, pentacle, pillow, pistol, quill, rectangular, rose, round, skull, snowflake, spherical, spiral, square, star, sword, triangular, triquetra, violin, and wing."

Written in the same neat script as the cover of this button schematics book are the words "Table of Contents" at the top of the first page. Divided into two columns below in tiny print you see a list of 62 types of buttons.
